isis.stitle: 5 SPEED AND 6 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS EATON SERIES - ASSEMBLE - MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-5205)

svcproc.title: MAINSHAFT ASSEMBLY (FS-5205)

note.para: Lubricate the gear bearing bores, gear hub faces, split washers, synchronizer friction surfaces, synchronizer cups and the mainshaft with transmission lube as the mainshaft is assembled. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION in the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual for recommended lubes.

svcproc.para: The following step numbers correspond to the numbers in Figure 127.

step1.para: With the mainshaft rear facing up, install the mainshaft assembly vertically in a vise.
Install 2nd gear bearing.
Install 2nd gear with 2nd gear clutching teeth down.
Install the locating ball and split washer in the mainshaft groove. Position split washer ends together at the locating ball.
Install 2nd gear split washer retaining ring.
Install reverse gear bearing.
Install reverse gear.
Install 1st-reverse clutch hub.
Install 1st-reverse clutch hub snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 1st-reverse sliding clutch.
Install 1st gear bearing.
Install 1st gear.
Install 1st gear split washer in the mainshaft groove. Position split washer ends together.
Install retainer ring over the split washer.
Use a sleeve type bearing driver and install the rear mainshaft bearing.

svcproc.para: The following step numbers correspond to the numbers in Figure 128.

step1.para: With the mainshaft front facing up, install the mainshaft assembly vertically in a vise.
Install 2nd-3rd speed synchronizer and cups.
Install 3rd gear bearing.
Install 3rd gear with 3rd gear clutching teeth down.
Install locating ball and 3rd gear thrust washer. Align washer indent with ball.
Install snap ring in the mainshaft groove.
Install 4th gear bearing.
Install 4th gear with 4th gear clutching teeth up.
Install 4th-5th clutch hub with 4th-5th clutch hub machined surface up.
Install the clutch hub thrust bearing and bearing race.
Install 4th-5th speed synchronizer and cups.
